name: 100 Milligrams Holding
description: Developer of a music mixing tool designed to help mix music using artificial intelligence. The company's artificial intelligence technology based application, enables users to create and monetize DJ mixes using licensed streams from Spotify and other music stream apps.
one_liner: Developer of a music mixing tool designed to help mix music using artificial intelligence. The company's artificial intelligence technology based application, enables users to create and monetize DJ mixes using licensed streams from Spotify and other music stream apps.
